meanings.definition: Thin layers of wood or other material used to cover a surface for decoration.
meanings.sent1: The furniture was beautifully adorned with veneerings.
meanings.sent2: He carefully applied the veneerings to the tabletop.
meanings.sent3: The artist mistakenly used veneerings on the wrong side of the cabinet!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a veneerings, hiding her true feelings underneath.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight gleamed off the veneerings, creating a stunning effect.

meanings.definition: The act of applying a thin layer of material to a surface for decoration.
meanings.sent1: The veneerings process requires precision and skill.
meanings.sent2: She learned the art of veneerings from her grandfather.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved a clever use of veneerings.
meanings.sent4: His charm was just a veneerings to mask his true intentions.
meanings.sent5: The cake was decorated with delicate veneerings of frosting.
